message: Did anyone else get an email from Codemasters saying that their account details had been compromised, and to change any shared passwords? This is all getting a little bit silly now.

Yep, I did.  It's also all over the news by now.

Thankfully they didn't have my credit card details.  And I never considered my personal info to be particularly safe in this day and age anyway.

And once again, thank god for 1Password.
And I see Epic Games website was hacked as well. *sigh*
Yeah, I just came to mention that too. Christ.
